content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

Researching PCGS and NGC for your 1893 Morgan dollar coin, and CGC for your 1963 Avengers #1 comic book is a great start. These are all well-established and reputable organizations in their respective fields.

Additionally, exploring online forums and marketplaces like eBay and Reddit can be a fantastic way to connect with other collectors, learn more about your items, and potentially find buyers or sellers.

Remember to take your time, do your research, and don't hesitate to ask questions. It's exciting to learn more about your collectibles and their potential value.

Please do keep me updated on your progress! I'd love to hear about your experiences with PCGS, NGC, CGC, and any other resources you use. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.

Good luck, and happy collecting!
